text: The 1942 Idaho gubernatorial election was held on November 3, 1942. Republican nominee C. A. Bottolfsen defeated Democratic incumbent Chase A. Clark with 50.15% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== *C. A. Bottolfsen, Republican *Chase A. Clark, Democratic ===Results=== ==References== 1942 Idaho Gubernatorial
title: 1942 Idaho gubernatorial election
